g.text: starts the creation of a new clinical analysis laboratory
Shows all tests and ask to select some of them.
Request data (name, ID, address, phone number, TIN)
createLaboratory(name, typesOfTestList, ID, address, phoneNumber, TIN)
lab = createNewLaboratory(nameOfLaboratory, ID, address, phoneNumber, TIN,typesOfTest)
Shows all the data and requests a confirmation
